fileindexer-desc: Creates an index that makes uploaded files searchable
fileindexer_sp_description: '''On this page you can index the following file formats:'''
fileindexer_sp_label_no_updates: Already indexed documents will be indexed again.
fileindexer_sp_help_wildcard_sign: '''Specify a sign to be used as wildcards in the 'Files' inputfield.'''
fileindexer_sp_help_file_matches:
'''The following inputs are allowed:'''
{|
|-
|style='font-size:18px;'|*
|style='padding-left:10px;'|— all files
|-
|style='font-size:18px;'|*.ext
|style='padding-left:10px;'|— all files that match the filetype (e.g.: '''.docx''')
|-
|style='font-size:18px;'|name.ext
|style='padding-left:10px;'|— specific filetypes (e.g.: '''somefile.docx''')
|}
fileindexer_sp_help_destination_namespac: '''Specify the destination namespace for the articles in which to create/update the files indexes.'''
fileindexer_sp_help_submits: By using the button 'Create' the indexing process will be initiated while using the button 'Check' will only result in a list of those files titles that would have been indexed by this request.
fileindexer_sp_msg_response_no_params: You have to specify at least one file!
fileindexer_sp_msg_response_files_index_: For the following list of articles the index creation process was started:
For the following list of articles the index update process was started:
For the following list of articles the index update process was suppressed:
fileindexer_sp_msg_response_files_not_fo: The following list of files could not be found:
fileindexer_sp_msg_response_files_with_u: The following list of files was of unsupported types:
fileindexer_sp_msg_response_files_to_be_: By this request the following list of files would have been indexed:
fileindexer_index_creation_failed_commen: Systemcheck showed missing or incorrect configurated, dependent commands!
fileindexer_msg_missing_dependencies: A systemcheck returned that some dependent applications for indexcreation are missing!
